function.name: bookClinicAppointment
function.description: Book a confirmed appointment for a patient. Checks availability in real-time. If the slot is taken, returns alternative times.

appointmentDate.description: The date of the appointment in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2026-01-20).

appointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment in HH:MM 24-hour format (e.g., 14:30).

patientEmail.description: The patient's email address for confirmation.

patientName.description: The full name of the patient.

patientPhone.description: The patient's phone number for SMS reminders.

serviceType.description: The type of service being booked.
